content: r round chain chain st stitch sts stitches slip_stitch slip stitch double_crochet double_crochet fdc- frontdouble crochet trp- triple crochet in round size large r1 chain 3 loop 11 double_crochet slip_stitch to the 1st double_crochet of the round to join 11 mark with pin continue in round r2 2 double_crochet in each st around to pin/stitch marker r3 1 double_crochet in the first st 2 double_crochet in the next st r4 1 double_crochet in the first 2 st 2 double_crochet in the next st r5 1 double_crochet in the first 3 st 2 double_crochet in the next st r6-r14 one double_crochet in each continue in round r15 20 double_crochet now working in frontdouble crochet creating eyebrow work 2 front double in each next 8 stitches one double_crochet in normal post marking middle of eyebrow finish 2 frontdouble in each next 8 stitches finish in normal double_crochet till pin/marker r16 double_crochet in each when come to eyebrow chain 6 for first eye counting 7 on back row of front double toggle together 2 triple crochet in next stitch in middle of eyes frontdouble crochet 3 triple in middle stitch and finish by toggling together 2 triple crochet in next stich chain 6 for next eye finish off row with double_crochet r17-18 double_crochet round r19- 20 spirals round doing a spiral crochet from youtube i chained 20 to 25 for different lengths of tentacles then random double_crochet 1 in each then 4 to 6 double_crochet in next two making it spiral i slipstitched it in and slipstitched over to do next working all the way round
